alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 29 at 8:59PM EDT until August 30 at 10:07PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Riverview near US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. For the Alafia...including Lithia , Riverview near US 301...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Alafia River at Riverview near US 301. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Water begins to impact homes on Pine Avenue and Park Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 0.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 4.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 5.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.0 feet on 09/26/2004. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Alafia River Riverview near US 4.2 0.8 Tue 8 pm 0.8 -0.3 -0.6 -0.3 0.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon at 300 PM EDT.
